text: Ðis syndon ðæraXIIhida landgemære into cyrnea & to calmundes dene þe Beorhtuf cyninc gebocode Ælfhege his fædeer sune ærest on bereforda of ðæm forda on willan dic of ðæm dice <<../images/tbar.gif>> on swiftan beorh of ðæ beorhge <<../images/tbar.gif>> on ebbeldic westwearde of ðære dic<../images/tbar.gif>on ea in brihtincbroc of ðæm broce<../images/tbar.gif>on cyrnea a ongean stretun ðæt on hrindanbroc of ðæm broce<../images/tbar.gif>on gerihte ðæt on ðone stan of ðæm stane<../images/tbar.gif>on winterwellan of ðære wellan ðæt on ðeofan dene andlong dene<../images/tbar.gif>on fos andlonges fos ðæt on hnices ðorn of ðæm ðorne on gerihte ðæt eft on bereford.
